name: Bad Meal - GameCodeur, Contamination
description:
I am officially a student in Gamecodeur school since February 2019. But I could focus on this training only since January 2020 (and I am also a IT student). This game is developed with Lua and Love2D.  I created this In about 2 weeks (I couldn’t code every day, I tried to find time as soon as possible)

For scripts, I programmed everything. For the graphism I made everything except image for the background and ground/plateforms which are given by David of Gamecodeur.

Finally, I didn’t make sounds (I think you can guess where they came from :D) and the music is TenderRemains by Myuu for people who wants to know :).  You can found my sounds and the music in these sound banks here :

https://www.auboutdufil.com/index.php?tag=instrumental

https://www.findsounds.com/ISAPI/search.dll

Sometimes my game always has physics problems but I hope you will have fun playing it !

Enjoy !
